get_states_of_all_devices.success_prompt: Here is the status of all your Home Assistant devices.
get_states_of_all_devices.fail_prompt: I'm sorry, I couldn't retrieve the status of your Home Assistant devices at this time.

function_name_examples.content:
User's request:
"Can you check the status of my smart home devices?"
Return "NOT_APPLICABLE" if there is no function that can help or the functions are unrelated to the query. Otherwise, pass the name of the function to call.
name_of_function_to_call='get_states_of_all_devices'
